Title: La machine
Actors: Gérard Depardieu, Nathalie Baye, Didier Bourdon
Plot: The psychiatrist Marc Laxroix is a studious scientist of the brains of criminals. He has an unhappy and loveless marriage with his wife Marie Lacroix and they have a boy, Léonard Lacroix. Marc has also a mistress, Marianne, who is...
